lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Essential workflow agents with core document and debugging skills optimized for amplified development
lite.useCase: Users wanting comprehensive amplified workflow management with essential document processing and debugging capabilities
lite.targetUsers: Beginners, evaluators, developers wanting balanced features with amplified productivity

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Complete workflow and development team with enhanced testing and validation skills for amplified development
standard.useCase: Professional accelerated development with full team coordination, testing, and comprehensive skill set
standard.targetUsers: Professional developers, teams focused on velocity, quality-focused users

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Complete installation with all capabilities optimized for maximum amplified development and automation
pro.useCase: Full-featured installation for users needing all AI codegen, document processing, testing, and advanced automation capabilities
pro.targetUsers: Power users, enterprises, teams requiring maximum velocity, automation-focused developers
